questions.question: If these activists are really interested in eradicating poverty and malnutrition they must put their money where their …………………… is.
questions.description: To put your money where your mouth is to practice what you preach.

questions.description: Pots of money = lot of money

questions.description: To throw money around is to spend it carelessly on unnecessary things.

questions.description: Hit pay dirt = Find something very profitable

questions.question: I had to pay through the ………………………… to get my old car repaired.
questions.description: To pay through the nose is to pay too much money for something.

questions.question: Employers are paying ………………………. dollar to retain talent.

questions.question: That velvet gown cost me a …………………………..
questions.description: When something costs you a pretty penny, it is very expensive.

questions.question: He earns the money, but it is his wife who holds the ..............................................
questions.description: To hold the purse strings = To hold the purse strings is to control a family’s or company’s money
